alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 3:49PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Box Butte and southeastern Dawes Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 248 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Box Butte Campground, or 24 miles northwest of Alliance, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hemingford, Box Butte Campground and Box Butte Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
